title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Science Competency Enhancement Through Learning Task-Technology Matching

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately select digital technologies (interactive simulations, data visualization tools, etc.) matching task requirements at over 80% accuracy
Learners can design technology-enhanced learning activities to segment scientific problem-solving processes into three or more phases
Learners can analyze technological affordances to propose workflow optimization strategies during team-based projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
